title: Zhuzh
description: Zhuzh is a lightweight browser extension that enhances your new tab experience with stunning SpaceX wallpapers, a quick Google search bar, and easy access to your top visited websites. Enjoy dynamic wallpapers that change automatically or can be manually cycled, perform quick searches, and instantly access your most frequented sites. Zhuzh transforms your browsing into a visually engaging and highly efficient activity, perfect for space enthusiasts and productivity seekers alike.
